Articles.Content:
Hello:D

Every time I try to run KSP with my own mod.It when load 0.0 . Where is my mod wrong?

File in my mod folder.

-TestAdapt.png

-model.mu

-part.cfg

HI need a few more details than that, is there anything shown in output_log.txt that refers to your mod, did it export correctly? open .mu with hex editor or similar and make sure it actually contains some information. It could be many things, what is the mod? does it rely on a plugin or is it a standalone part mod? Is your cfg correct the simplest thing such as placing a period when it should be a comma can stop a mod loading.

The more information we get the easier it is to diagnose your problem
I suspect the hang on loading is due to a error in the part.cfg. Would you mind posting its contents in addition to the items suggested by SpannerMonkey?
